name: Follow The Light (BroReNata)
description:
You get separated from your tour guide and are now lost in an ancient temple. You inexplicably gain physics defying abilities such as a double jump and a little bit of magic. You need to make your way back with only torchlight to guide you.

In each room you need to activate the door by lighting the orb. Then you need to reach the door before time runs out. Hit spikes or fall to your death and the level will restart. To help you make it in time, you have gained a dash ability. It has a cooldown so make sure to not waste it.

Some rooms will have moving platforms. You can freeze these in place for a few seconds to help you traverse the rooms.

Controls:

PS4/PS5 ControllerXbox ControllerPC/KeyboardMovementLeft stickLeft stickArrow keys or WASDJumpCross (X)ASpacebarInteract (only if a question mark is above your head)Circle (O)BEDashR1RQFreeze PlatformsSquareXCRestartTriangleYR

Credits:

Tileset - https://the-baldur.itch.io/pixelart-adventure-pack

Music - original song done by StoreBoughtFood https://soundcloud.com/storeboughtfood
